name: signing-today-web
description: *Signing Today* is the perfect Digital Signature Gateway. Whenever in Your workflow You need to add one or more Digital Signatures to Your document, *Signing Today* is the right choice. You prepare Your documents, *Signing Today* takes care of all the rest: send invitations (`signature tickets`) to signers, collects their signatures, send You back the signed document. Integrating *Signing Today* in Your existing applications is very easy. Just follow these API specifications and get inspired by the many examples presented hereafter.
